description: PM Modi launches e-NAM - the e-trading platform for National Agriculture Market 21 mandis from 8 States have join e-NAM e-NAM to usher in transparency, greatly benefit the farmers: PM Modi e-NAM a
caption: nm-4.com
message:
eNAM's launch is a turning point for our agriculture sector. Farmers & consumers will gain through this initiative. 

Spoke on how eNAM increases transparency & ensures better returns for farmers. Also talked of need to view agriculture sector holistically. http://nm-4.com/u1fm
